<Link id="l00558" /><CodeLine lineNumber="558"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// There are thre cases of division and remainder: Dividing with a register</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="559"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// needs a divide instruction. A divisor which is a power of two constant</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00644" /><CodeLine lineNumber="644"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ST-&gt;hasVector()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00645" /><CodeLine lineNumber="645"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;VTy = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;FixedVectorType&gt;</a>(Ty);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00646" /><CodeLine lineNumber="646"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> VF = VTy-&gt;getNumElements();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00647" /><CodeLine lineNumber="647"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumVectors = <a href="#af4be533423e3315d09f9d6ff82049e3b">getNumVectorRegs</a>(Ty);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00648" /><CodeLine lineNumber="648"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00649" /><CodeLine lineNumber="649"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// These vector operations are custom handled, but are still supported</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00650" /><CodeLine lineNumber="650"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// with one instruction per vector, regardless of element size.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00651" /><CodeLine lineNumber="651"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Opcode == Instruction::Shl || Opcode == Instruction::LShr ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00652" /><CodeLine lineNumber="652"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Opcode == Instruction::AShr) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00653" /><CodeLine lineNumber="653"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumVectors;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00654" /><CodeLine lineNumber="654"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00655" /><CodeLine lineNumber="655"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00656" /><CodeLine lineNumber="656"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (DivRemConstPow2)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00657" /><CodeLine lineNumber="657"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NumVectors &#42; (SignedDivRem ? SDivPow2Cost : 1));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00658" /><CodeLine lineNumber="658"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (DivRemConst) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00659" /><CodeLine lineNumber="659"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;Type &#42;&gt;</a> Tys(Args.size(), Ty);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00660" /><CodeLine lineNumber="660"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> VF &#42; DivMulSeqCost +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00661" /><CodeLine lineNumber="661"><span class="doxyHighlight">             <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#ad46cd19003cfbd8c6436b8c92172efa8">BaseT::getScalarizationOverhead</a>(VTy, Args, Tys, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00662" /><CodeLine lineNumber="662"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00663" /><CodeLine lineNumber="663"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SignedDivRem || UnsignedDivRem) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00664" /><CodeLine lineNumber="664"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ST-&gt;hasVectorEnhancements3() &amp;&amp; ScalarBits &gt;= 32)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00665" /><CodeLine lineNumber="665"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumVectors &#42; DivInstrCost;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00666" /><CodeLine lineNumber="666"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (VF &gt; 4)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00667" /><CodeLine lineNumber="667"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Temporary hack: disable high vectorization factors with integer</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00668" /><CodeLine lineNumber="668"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// division/remainder, which will get scalarized and handled with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00669" /><CodeLine lineNumber="669"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// GR128 registers. The mischeduler is not clever enough to avoid</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00670" /><CodeLine lineNumber="670"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// spilling yet.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00671" /><CodeLine lineNumber="671"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 1000;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00672" /><CodeLine lineNumber="672"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00673" /><CodeLine lineNumber="673"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00674" /><CodeLine lineNumber="674"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// These FP operations are supported with a single vector instruction for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00675" /><CodeLine lineNumber="675"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// double (base implementation assumes float generally costs 2). For</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00676" /><CodeLine lineNumber="676"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FP128, the scalar cost is 1, and there is no overhead since the values</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00677" /><CodeLine lineNumber="677"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// are already in scalar registers.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00678" /><CodeLine lineNumber="678"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Opcode == Instruction::FAdd || Opcode == Instruction::FSub ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00679" /><CodeLine lineNumber="679"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Opcode == Instruction::FMul || Opcode == Instruction::FDiv) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00680" /><CodeLine lineNumber="680"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">switch</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ScalarBits) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00681" /><CodeLine lineNumber="681"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 32: &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00682" /><CodeLine lineNumber="682"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The vector enhancements facility 1 provides v4f32 instructions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00683" /><CodeLine lineNumber="683"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ST-&gt;hasVectorEnhancements1())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00684" /><CodeLine lineNumber="684"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumVectors;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00685" /><CodeLine lineNumber="685"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Return the cost of multiple scalar invocation plus the cost of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00686" /><CodeLine lineNumber="686"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// inserting and extracting the values.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00687" /><CodeLine lineNumber="687"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> ScalarCost =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00688" /><CodeLine lineNumber="688"><span class="doxyHighlight">            <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/systemzttiimpl/#acb4134cc102c16e03344a4b4b21f1ea7">getArithmeticInstrCost</a>(Opcode, Ty-&gt;getScalarType(), <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00689" /><CodeLine lineNumber="689"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;Type &#42;&gt;</a> Tys(Args.size(), Ty);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00690" /><CodeLine lineNumber="690"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00691" /><CodeLine lineNumber="691"><span class="doxyHighlight">            (VF &#42; ScalarCost) +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00692" /><CodeLine lineNumber="692"><span class="doxyHighlight">            <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#ad46cd19003cfbd8c6436b8c92172efa8">BaseT::getScalarizationOverhead</a>(VTy, Args, Tys, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00693" /><CodeLine lineNumber="693"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: VF 2 for these FP operations are currently just as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00694" /><CodeLine lineNumber="694"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// expensive as for VF 4</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00695" /><CodeLine lineNumber="695"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (VF == 2)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00696" /><CodeLine lineNumber="696"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> &#42;= 2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00697" /><CodeLine lineNumber="697"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00698" /><CodeLine lineNumber="698"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00699" /><CodeLine lineNumber="699"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 64:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00700" /><CodeLine lineNumber="700"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 128:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00701" /><CodeLine lineNumber="701"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumVectors;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00702" /><CodeLine lineNumber="702"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">default</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00703" /><CodeLine lineNumber="703"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00704" /><CodeLine lineNumber="704"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00705" /><CodeLine lineNumber="705"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00706" /><CodeLine lineNumber="706"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00707" /><CodeLine lineNumber="707"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// There is no native support for FRem.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00708" /><CodeLine lineNumber="708"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Opcode == Instruction::FRem) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00711" /><CodeLine lineNumber="711"><span class="doxyHighlight">          (VF &#42; LIBCALL&#95;COST) +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00712" /><CodeLine lineNumber="712"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#ad46cd19003cfbd8c6436b8c92172efa8">BaseT::getScalarizationOverhead</a>(VTy, Args, Tys, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00713" /><CodeLine lineNumber="713"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: VF 2 for float is currently just as expensive as for VF 4</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00714" /><CodeLine lineNumber="714"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (VF == 2 &amp;&amp; ScalarBits == 32)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00717" /><CodeLine lineNumber="717"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00718" /><CodeLine lineNumber="718"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00729" /><CodeLine lineNumber="729"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Kind = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#a43d9b7161f7ae393a165599ca211fe2f">improveShuffleKindFromMask</a>(Kind, Mask, Tp, Index, SubTp);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00730" /><CodeLine lineNumber="730"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ST-&gt;hasVector()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00731" /><CodeLine lineNumber="731"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumVectors = <a href="#af4be533423e3315d09f9d6ff82049e3b">getNumVectorRegs</a>(Tp);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00732" /><CodeLine lineNumber="732"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00733" /><CodeLine lineNumber="733"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: Since fp32 is expanded, the shuffle cost should always be 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00734" /><CodeLine lineNumber="734"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00735" /><CodeLine lineNumber="735"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FP128 values are always in scalar registers, so there is no work</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00736" /><CodeLine lineNumber="736"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// involved with a shuffle, except for broadcast. In that case register</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00737" /><CodeLine lineNumber="737"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// moves are done with a single instruction per element.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00738" /><CodeLine lineNumber="738"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Tp-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#a7c742b32ebcd73d6dc851afac295b0f2">getScalarType</a>()-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#a6f174fc924aa9cccf2abce5ef4b5ec9a">isFP128Ty</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00739" /><CodeLine lineNumber="739"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Kind == <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo/#af46433d0e36d3f80afc3a8c67b5c53ecab1ac8982cdb119f39a5fe74610a46796">TargetTransformInfo::SK&#95;Broadcast</a> ? NumVectors - 1 : 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00740" /><CodeLine lineNumber="740"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00741" /><CodeLine lineNumber="741"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">switch</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Kind) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00742" /><CodeLine lineNumber="742"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo/#af46433d0e36d3f80afc3a8c67b5c53ecafd6c03f570400fcb24d861aa21ddffe9">TargetTransformInfo::SK&#95;ExtractSubvector</a>:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00743" /><CodeLine lineNumber="743"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ExtractSubvector Index indicates start offset.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00744" /><CodeLine lineNumber="744"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00745" /><CodeLine lineNumber="745"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Extracting a subvector from first index is a noop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00746" /><CodeLine lineNumber="746"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Index == 0 ? 0 : NumVectors);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00747" /><CodeLine lineNumber="747"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00748" /><CodeLine lineNumber="748"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo/#af46433d0e36d3f80afc3a8c67b5c53ecab1ac8982cdb119f39a5fe74610a46796">TargetTransformInfo::SK&#95;Broadcast</a>:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00749" /><CodeLine lineNumber="749"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Loop vectorizer calls here to figure out the extra cost of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00750" /><CodeLine lineNumber="750"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// broadcasting a loaded value to all elements of a vector. Since vlrep</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00751" /><CodeLine lineNumber="751"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// loads and replicates with a single instruction, adjust the returned</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00752" /><CodeLine lineNumber="752"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00753" /><CodeLine lineNumber="753"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumVectors - 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00754" /><CodeLine lineNumber="754"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00755" /><CodeLine lineNumber="755"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">default</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00756" /><CodeLine lineNumber="756"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00757" /><CodeLine lineNumber="757"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SystemZ supports single instruction permutation / replication.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00758" /><CodeLine lineNumber="758"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumVectors;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00759" /><CodeLine lineNumber="759"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00760" /><CodeLine lineNumber="760"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00761" /><CodeLine lineNumber="761"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00762" /><CodeLine lineNumber="762"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#a60269460307676b0f5be6e2e22044529">BaseT::getShuffleCost</a>(Kind, Tp, Mask, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>, Index, SubTp);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00763" /><CodeLine lineNumber="763"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00764" /><CodeLine lineNumber="764"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00765" /><CodeLine lineNumber="765"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Return the log2 difference of the element sizes of the two vector types.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00791" /><CodeLine lineNumber="791"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Up to 2 vector registers can be truncated efficiently with pack or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00792" /><CodeLine lineNumber="792"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// permute. The latter requires an immediate mask to be loaded, which</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00793" /><CodeLine lineNumber="793"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// typically gets hoisted out of a loop.  TODO: return a good value for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00794" /><CodeLine lineNumber="794"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// BB-VECTORIZER that includes the immediate loads, which we do not want</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00795" /><CodeLine lineNumber="795"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to count for the loop vectorizer.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00796" /><CodeLine lineNumber="796"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 1;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00801" /><CodeLine lineNumber="801"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a> = 0; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a> &lt; Log2Diff; ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00868" /><CodeLine lineNumber="868"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Get the cost of converting a boolean vector to a vector with same width</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00966" /><CodeLine lineNumber="966"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00967" /><CodeLine lineNumber="967"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ST-&gt;hasVector()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00968" /><CodeLine lineNumber="968"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Vector to scalar cast.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00969" /><CodeLine lineNumber="969"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;SrcVecTy = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;FixedVectorType&gt;</a>(Src);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00970" /><CodeLine lineNumber="970"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;DstVecTy = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;FixedVectorType&gt;</a>(Dst);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00971" /><CodeLine lineNumber="971"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!DstVecTy) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00972" /><CodeLine lineNumber="972"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: tune vector-to-scalar cast.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00973" /><CodeLine lineNumber="973"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#ad0c9ac06022884eb218dc8f8c4056e43">BaseT::getCastInstrCost</a>(Opcode, Dst, Src, CCH, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00974" /><CodeLine lineNumber="974"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00975" /><CodeLine lineNumber="975"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> VF = SrcVecTy-&gt;getNumElements();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00976" /><CodeLine lineNumber="976"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumDstVectors = <a href="#af4be533423e3315d09f9d6ff82049e3b">getNumVectorRegs</a>(Dst);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00977" /><CodeLine lineNumber="977"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumSrcVectors = <a href="#af4be533423e3315d09f9d6ff82049e3b">getNumVectorRegs</a>(Src);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00978" /><CodeLine lineNumber="978"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00979" /><CodeLine lineNumber="979"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Opcode == Instruction::Trunc) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00980" /><CodeLine lineNumber="980"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Src-&gt;getScalarSizeInBits() == Dst-&gt;getScalarSizeInBits())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00981" /><CodeLine lineNumber="981"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 0; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check for NOOP conversions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00982" /><CodeLine lineNumber="982"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/systemzttiimpl/#a694f0a06fb32a28862ef184803eaadd8">getVectorTruncCost</a>(Src, Dst);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00983" /><CodeLine lineNumber="983"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00984" /><CodeLine lineNumber="984"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00985" /><CodeLine lineNumber="985"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Opcode == Instruction::ZExt || Opcode == Instruction::SExt) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00986" /><CodeLine lineNumber="986"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SrcScalarBits &gt;= 8) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00987" /><CodeLine lineNumber="987"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ZExt will use either a single unpack or a vector permute.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00988" /><CodeLine lineNumber="988"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Opcode == Instruction::ZExt)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00989" /><CodeLine lineNumber="989"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumDstVectors;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00990" /><CodeLine lineNumber="990"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00991" /><CodeLine lineNumber="991"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SExt will be handled with one unpack per doubling of width.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00992" /><CodeLine lineNumber="992"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumUnpacks = <a href="#a2f0f3c8ae1e70783849672eb85b035fc">getElSizeLog2Diff</a>(Src, Dst);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00993" /><CodeLine lineNumber="993"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00994" /><CodeLine lineNumber="994"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For types that spans multiple vector registers, some additional</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00995" /><CodeLine lineNumber="995"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instructions are used to setup the unpacking.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00996" /><CodeLine lineNumber="996"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumSrcVectorOps =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00997" /><CodeLine lineNumber="997"><span class="doxyHighlight">          (NumUnpacks &gt; 1 ? (NumDstVectors - NumSrcVectors)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00998" /><CodeLine lineNumber="998"><span class="doxyHighlight">                          : (NumDstVectors / 2));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00999" /><CodeLine lineNumber="999"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01000" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1000"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NumUnpacks &#42; NumDstVectors) + NumSrcVectorOps;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1001"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1002"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SrcScalarBits == 1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1003"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/systemzttiimpl/#a3b9c7d767cfaf2223fec3170abc7be03">getBoolVecToIntConversionCost</a>(Opcode, Dst, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1004"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1005"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1006"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Opcode == Instruction::SIToFP || Opcode == Instruction::UIToFP ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1007"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Opcode == Instruction::FPToSI || Opcode == Instruction::FPToUI) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1008"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: Fix base implementation which could simplify things a bit here</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1009"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (seems to miss on differentiating on scalar/vector types).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1010"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1011"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Only 64 bit vector conversions are natively supported before z15.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1012"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (DstScalarBits == 64 || ST-&gt;hasVectorEnhancements2()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1013"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SrcScalarBits == DstScalarBits)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1014"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumDstVectors;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1015"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1016"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SrcScalarBits == 1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1017"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/systemzttiimpl/#a3b9c7d767cfaf2223fec3170abc7be03">getBoolVecToIntConversionCost</a>(Opcode, Dst, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) + NumDstVectors;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1018"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1019"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1020"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Return the cost of multiple scalar invocation plus the cost of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1021"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// inserting and extracting the values. Base implementation does not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1022"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// realize float-&gt;int gets scalarized.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1023"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> ScalarCost = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/systemzttiimpl/#ab3f2b8802cc38cd06a851443f6412807">getCastInstrCost</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1024"><span class="doxyHighlight">          Opcode, Dst-&gt;getScalarType(), Src-&gt;getScalarType(), CCH, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1025"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> TotCost = VF &#42; ScalarCost;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1026"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NeedsInserts = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, NeedsExtracts = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1027"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FP128 registers do not get inserted or extracted.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1028"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (DstScalarBits == 128 &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1029"><span class="doxyHighlight">          (Opcode == Instruction::SIToFP || Opcode == Instruction::UIToFP))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1030"><span class="doxyHighlight">        NeedsInserts = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1031"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SrcScalarBits == 128 &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1032"><span class="doxyHighlight">          (Opcode == Instruction::FPToSI || Opcode == Instruction::FPToUI))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1033"><span class="doxyHighlight">        NeedsExtracts = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1034"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1035"><span class="doxyHighlight">      TotCost += <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#ad46cd19003cfbd8c6436b8c92172efa8">BaseT::getScalarizationOverhead</a>(SrcVecTy, </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;Insert&#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1036"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                 NeedsExtracts, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1037"><span class="doxyHighlight">      TotCost += <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#ad46cd19003cfbd8c6436b8c92172efa8">BaseT::getScalarizationOverhead</a>(DstVecTy, NeedsInserts,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1038"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                 </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;Extract&#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1039"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1040"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: VF 2 for float&lt;-&gt;i32 is currently just as expensive as for VF 4</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1041"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (VF == 2 &amp;&amp; SrcScalarBits == 32 &amp;&amp; DstScalarBits == 32)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1042"><span class="doxyHighlight">        TotCost &#42;= 2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1043"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1044"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TotCost;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1045"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1046"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1047"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Opcode == Instruction::FPTrunc) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1048"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SrcScalarBits == 128)  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// fp128 -&gt; double/float + inserts of elements.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1049"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> VF </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;ldxbr/lexbr&#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1050"><span class="doxyHighlight">               <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#ad46cd19003cfbd8c6436b8c92172efa8">BaseT::getScalarizationOverhead</a>(DstVecTy, </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;Insert&#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1051"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                               </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;Extract&#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1052"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// double -&gt; float</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1053"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> VF / 2 </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;vledb&#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> + std::max(1U, VF / 4 </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;vperm&#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1054"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1055"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1056"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Opcode == Instruction::FPExt) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1057"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SrcScalarBits == 32 &amp;&amp; DstScalarBits == 64) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1058"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// float -&gt; double is very rare and currently unoptimized. Instead of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1059"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// using vldeb, which can do two at a time, all conversions are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1060"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// scalarized.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1061"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> VF &#42; 2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1062"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1063"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// -&gt; fp128.  VF &#42; lxdb/lxeb + extraction of elements.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1064"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> VF + <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#ad46cd19003cfbd8c6436b8c92172efa8">BaseT::getScalarizationOverhead</a>(SrcVecTy, </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;Insert&#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1065"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;Extract&#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1066"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1067"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1068"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1069"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#ad0c9ac06022884eb218dc8f8c4056e43">BaseT::getCastInstrCost</a>(Opcode, Dst, Src, CCH, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1070"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1071"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1072"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Scalar i8 / i16 operations will typically be made after first extending</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1073"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the operands to i32.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1074" lineLink="#a3f4649c90b5297a0d5c1608da9f6ac9b"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a3f4649c90b5297a0d5c1608da9f6ac9b">getOperandsExtensionCost</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1075"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ExtCost = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1076"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a> : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;operands())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1077"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A load of i8 or i16 sign/zero extends to i32.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1078"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;LoadInst&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>) &amp;&amp; !<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;ConstantInt&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1079"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ExtCost++;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1080"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1166"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;CmpOpTy = ((<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> != </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) ? <a href="#a5e5d97b679ac5ed7ad7f5b4639c450d7">getCmpOpsType</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>, VF) : </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1172"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1367"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1368"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1369"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The generic implementation of getInterleavedMemoryOpCost() is based on</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1370"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// adding costs of the memory operations plus all the extracts and inserts</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1371"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// needed for using / defining the vector operands. The SystemZ version does</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1372"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// roughly the same but bases the computations on vector permutations</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1373"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instead.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1374" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/systemzttiimpl/#a1a15e8dd266694612ad050ea8d4b4cbd"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/systemzttiimpl/#a1a15e8dd266694612ad050ea8d4b4cbd">SystemZTTIImpl::getInterleavedMemoryOpCost</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1375"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Opcode, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;VecTy, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Factor, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;unsigned&gt;</a> Indices,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1376"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> Alignment, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/nvptxas/#ad7d00b71af84502be65ae2de3f8d91dc">AddressSpace</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo/#a706f223f760b55668fbae74202b816bb">TTI::TargetCostKind</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1377"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> UseMaskForCond, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> UseMaskForGaps) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1378"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (UseMaskForCond || UseMaskForGaps)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1379"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#a09ac3c26a04fdf36e4bcc0e725fca41e">BaseT::getInterleavedMemoryOpCost</a>(Opcode, VecTy, Factor, Indices,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1380"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                             Alignment, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/nvptxas/#ad7d00b71af84502be65ae2de3f8d91dc">AddressSpace</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1381"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                             UseMaskForCond, UseMaskForGaps);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1382"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;VectorType&gt;</a>(VecTy) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1383"><span class="doxyHighlight">         </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Expect a vector type for interleaved memory op&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1384"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1385"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumElts = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;FixedVectorType&gt;</a>(VecTy)-&gt;getNumElements();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1386"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Factor &gt; 1 &amp;&amp; NumElts % Factor == 0 &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Invalid interleave factor&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1387"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> VF = NumElts / Factor;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1388"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumEltsPerVecReg = (128U / <a href="#a69eeffbc38c079195008fbfb5aaad0b9">getScalarSizeInBits</a>(VecTy));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1389"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumVectorMemOps = <a href="#af4be533423e3315d09f9d6ff82049e3b">getNumVectorRegs</a>(VecTy);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1390"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumPermutes = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1391"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1392"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Opcode == Instruction::Load) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1393"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Loading interleave groups may have gaps, which may mean fewer</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1394"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// loads. Find out how many vectors will be loaded in total, and in how</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1395"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// many of them each value will be in.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1396"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitvector">BitVector</a> UsedInsts(NumVectorMemOps, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1397"><span class="doxyHighlight">    std::vector&lt;BitVector&gt; ValueVecs(Factor, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitvector">BitVector</a>(NumVectorMemOps, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1398"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Index : Indices)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1399"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Elt = 0; Elt &lt; VF; ++Elt) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1400"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Vec = (Index + Elt &#42; Factor) / NumEltsPerVecReg;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1401"><span class="doxyHighlight">        UsedInsts.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitvector/#a62237ebe27691377a942abe7446332ec">set</a>(Vec);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1402"><span class="doxyHighlight">        ValueVecs&#91;Index&#93;.set(Vec);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1403"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1404"><span class="doxyHighlight">    NumVectorMemOps = UsedInsts.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitvector/#a568ff706b8c5991bd299c8c00b803897">count</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1405"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1406"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Index : Indices) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01407" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1407"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Estimate that each loaded source vector containing this Index</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01408" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1408"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// requires one operation, except that vperm can handle two input</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1409"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// registers first time for each dst vector.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01410" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1410"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumSrcVecs = ValueVecs&#91;Index&#93;.count();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01411" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1411"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumDstVecs = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9dda4472ee0b7ea92ab49eedf6e13d50">divideCeil</a>(VF &#42; <a href="#a69eeffbc38c079195008fbfb5aaad0b9">getScalarSizeInBits</a>(VecTy), 128U);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01412" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1412"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a> (NumSrcVecs &gt;= NumDstVecs &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Expected at least as many sources&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01413" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1413"><span class="doxyHighlight">      NumPermutes += std::max(1U, NumSrcVecs - NumDstVecs);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1414"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1415"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1416"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Estimate the permutes for each stored vector as the smaller of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01417" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1417"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// number of elements and the number of source vectors. Subtract one per</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1418"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// dst vector for vperm (S.A.).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1419"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumSrcVecs = std::min(NumEltsPerVecReg, Factor);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1420"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumDstVecs = NumVectorMemOps;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1421"><span class="doxyHighlight">    NumPermutes += (NumDstVecs &#42; NumSrcVecs) - NumDstVecs;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1422"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1423"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1424"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Cost of load/store operations and the permutations needed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1425"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumVectorMemOps + NumPermutes;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1426"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1427"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1428" lineLink="#a3cf638f94373302708e10f3bffecd8f3"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> <a href="#a3cf638f94373302708e10f3bffecd8f3">getIntAddReductionCost</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumVec, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ScalarBits) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1429"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1430"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Binary Tree of N/2 + N/4 + ... operations yields N - 1 operations total.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1431"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> += NumVec - 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1432"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For integer adds, VSUM creates shorter reductions on the final vector.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1433"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> += (ScalarBits &lt; 32) ? 3 : 2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1434"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1435"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1436"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1437" lineLink="#adc334ed6d48bd887ada88cfdc2190ae5"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> <a href="#adc334ed6d48bd887ada88cfdc2190ae5">getFastReductionCost</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumVec, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumElems,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1438"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                     </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ScalarBits) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1439"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumEltsPerVecReg = (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/systemz/#a5e2f6288a79b32c4bc9f22fe3f3222b2">SystemZ::VectorBits</a> / ScalarBits);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1440"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1441"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Binary Tree of N/2 + N/4 + ... operations yields N - 1 operations total.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1442"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> += NumVec - 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1443"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For each shuffle / arithmetic layer, we need 2 instructions, and we need</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1444"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// log2(Elements in Last Vector) layers.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1445"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> += 2 &#42; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a058782b98991f0719657d9008d3df41b">Log2&#95;32&#95;Ceil</a>(std::min(NumElems, NumEltsPerVecReg));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1446"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1447"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1448"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1449" lineLink="#a1f4ffbc3fad305641b7ca997a89aa002"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a1f4ffbc3fad305641b7ca997a89aa002">customCostReductions</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Opcode) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1450"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Opcode == Instruction::FAdd || Opcode == Instruction::FMul ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1451"><span class="doxyHighlight">         Opcode == Instruction::Add || Opcode == Instruction::Mul;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1452"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1453"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1454"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a></span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1455" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/systemzttiimpl/#acbad6d70dd3351b812d5b74353574207"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/systemzttiimpl/#acbad6d70dd3351b812d5b74353574207">SystemZTTIImpl::getArithmeticReductionCost</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Opcode, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vectortype">VectorType</a> &#42;Ty,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1456"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                           std::optional&lt;FastMathFlags&gt; FMF,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1457"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                           <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo/#a706f223f760b55668fbae74202b816bb">TTI::TargetCostKind</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1458"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ScalarBits = Ty-&gt;getScalarSizeInBits();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1459"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The following is only for subtargets with vector math, non-ordered</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1460"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// reductions, and reasonable scalar sizes for int and fp add/mul.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1461"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="#a1f4ffbc3fad305641b7ca997a89aa002">customCostReductions</a>(Opcode) &amp;&amp; ST-&gt;hasVector() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01462" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1462"><span class="doxyHighlight">      !<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo/#a7aecc3cf03beff532c2b8bfe81e500c8">TTI::requiresOrderedReduction</a>(FMF) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1463"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ScalarBits &lt;= <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/systemz/#a5e2f6288a79b32c4bc9f22fe3f3222b2">SystemZ::VectorBits</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1464"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumVectors = <a href="#af4be533423e3315d09f9d6ff82049e3b">getNumVectorRegs</a>(Ty);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1465"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumElems = ((<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedvectortype">FixedVectorType</a> &#42;)Ty)-&gt;getNumElements();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1466"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Integer Add is using custom code gen, that needs to be accounted for.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1467"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Opcode == Instruction::Add)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1468"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a3cf638f94373302708e10f3bffecd8f3">getIntAddReductionCost</a>(NumVectors, ScalarBits);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1469"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The base cost is the same across all other arithmetic instructions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1470"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1471"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="#adc334ed6d48bd887ada88cfdc2190ae5">getFastReductionCost</a>(NumVectors, NumElems, ScalarBits);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1472"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// But we need to account for the final op involving the scalar operand.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1473"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((Opcode == Instruction::FAdd) || (Opcode == Instruction::FMul))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1474"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> += 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1475"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1476"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1477"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// otherwise, fall back to the standard implementation</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1482" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/systemzttiimpl/#acafd771f9c54c189a2cdec8c6fda24d2"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/systemzttiimpl/#acafd771f9c54c189a2cdec8c6fda24d2">SystemZTTIImpl::getMinMaxReductionCost</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/intrinsic/#a80add6b3b1cdaec560907995127adc16">Intrinsic::ID</a> IID, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vectortype">VectorType</a> &#42;Ty,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1484"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                       <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo/#a706f223f760b55668fbae74202b816bb">TTI::TargetCostKind</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1485"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Return custom costs only on subtargets with vector enhancements.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1486"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ST-&gt;hasVectorEnhancements1()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1487"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumVectors = <a href="#af4be533423e3315d09f9d6ff82049e3b">getNumVectorRegs</a>(Ty);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1488"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumElems = ((<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedvectortype">FixedVectorType</a> &#42;)Ty)-&gt;getNumElements();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1489"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ScalarBits = Ty-&gt;getScalarSizeInBits();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1490"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1491"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Binary Tree of N/2 + N/4 + ... operations yields N - 1 operations total.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1492"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> += NumVectors - 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1493"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For the final vector, we need shuffle + min/max operations, and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1494"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we need #Elements - 1 of them.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1495"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> += 2 &#42; (std::min(NumElems, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/systemz/#a5e2f6288a79b32c4bc9f22fe3f3222b2">SystemZ::VectorBits</a> / ScalarBits) - 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1496"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1497"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1498"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For other targets, fall back to the standard implementation</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1499"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#a4b5cc16bea89163600c002e89334a82e">BaseT::getMinMaxReductionCost</a>(IID, Ty, FMF, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>);</span></CodeLine>
